definition: to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Pajama pants feature a drawstring waist tie for an easy, adjustable fit.
sentences.chinese: 睡褲功能束帶腰部綁了一個簡單的，可調適合。

sentences.english: Epaulettes, belted waist and cuffs, central back vent.
sentences.chinese: 肩飾，腰部和袖口束帶，背部開褶中心透氣位。

sentences.english: Elastic waistband features a satin drawstring for an adjustable fit.
sentences.chinese: 彈性腰帶有調節適合綢緞束帶的功能。

sentences.english: Standard-rise belted waist with a finished curtain waistband.
sentences.chinese: 標準束帶腰部上升，成品窗簾腰帶。

sentences.english: An adjustable strap allows you to comfortably adjust the mask to fit your face.
sentences.chinese: 眼罩後面的束帶可自由伸縮，根據臉型調整長短。

sentences.english: This is the harness into which Mother must strap herself in order to display that perfect figure.
sentences.chinese: 這就是母親爲了展示她的優美體形所使用的束帶。

sentences.english: Weight loss was comparable to that of laparoscopic gastric band placement.
sentences.chinese: 體重下降與腹腔鏡下胃束帶放置具有可比性。

sentences.english: Wraps are clamped by suitable straps in three points.
sentences.chinese: 在三處合適的地方使用束帶將包裝材料夾緊固牢。

sentences.english: The main strap can be tightened with a pretty simple tug on the inside lever.
sentences.chinese: 主要的束帶可以藉由簡單的扳動中央撥杆來束緊。

sentences.english: Gorgeous empire gown flaunts a wrap - style bodice and drawstring tie.
sentences.chinese: 華麗的禮服帝國標榜一包式胸衣和束帶配合。

sentences.english: Found in gardens and vacant lots, garters are among the most common snakes from Canada to Central America.
sentences.chinese: 束帶蛇爲加拿大至中美洲一帶最常見的蛇類之一。

sentences.english: Classic heritage epaulettes, gun flaps, belted waist and cuffs.
sentences.chinese: 經典傳統肩飾，菧喜，腰部和袖口束帶。

sentences.english: Belts are skinny and cinch in the waist featuring metal or snake.
sentences.chinese: 腰帶提倡極細款，束帶爲金屬或者是蛇皮的材質。

sentences.english: You have whiplash. You'll need to wear a neck device for two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 你被撞傷了，要用束帶固定兩星期。
